text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tryouts—a stage where runners<n>aspiring to make their debut
can show<n>off their skills to trainers.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She lives up to the hype! Her speed is<n>incredible! She's
crossing the finish<n>line with two whole lengths ahead of<n>
the pack!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me! If you join me, I'll make<n>sure you win a graded
race! Even G1<n>races will be in your reach!

text_block_list.name: First Place Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you very much! I'll do my<n>best!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The students pour their hearts and<n>souls into running, and
trainers do<n>everything in their power to make<n>their racers'
dreams come true.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My desire to support them is strong,<n>but when it comes to
actual scouting, I<n>find myself freezing up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, the morning tryouts<n>have ended. I leave
the course without<n>the courage to even speak to a single<n>
person.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I take it you haven't found your<n>perfect trainee yet?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, excuse me for coming up to<n>you so suddenly. My
name is Super<n>Creek.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: You're new to Tracen Academy,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hmm... I just had a feeling. ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I noticed you were struggling to talk to<n>the runners and how
you were<n>intimidated by the other trainers.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But I'm sure there's a runner out<n>there waiting for you, so
please don't<n>give up!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe that I'm the one being<n>encouraged by a
student. It's usually<n>the other way around...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
It seems like there's a reason why<n>it's hard for you to
speak up.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Would you like to share your thoughts<n>with me? Sometimes
it helps to get<n>things off your chest.
choice_data_list:
I don't know what I can and can't do as a new
trainer.

I don't know what I can and can't do as a new
trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I express my worries about how the<n>more experienced
trainers might be<n>better suited for such passionate<n>
athletes.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...I see, so that's how you feel.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's nervous and wants to be<n>extra cautious in the
beginning. But<n>that's a good thing.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
It shows that you're a kind and<n>considerate person. You
really take<n>your job seriously... At least, that's<n>how I feel.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
By the way, I'll be running in a race<n>later this afternoon. If
you're<n>interested, would you like to come<n>and see?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, thank you. You won't regret it!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I feel a sense of ease wash over me<n>as I listen to her
words and see her<n>smile.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The afternoon race begins, and Super<n>Creek bursts from the
starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leading pack has rounded the<n>first corner! Super Creek
is already<n>breaking away from the group!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without faltering even once, she<n>continues to dominate until
the very<n>end.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek charges down the track<n>and finishes in first
place!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Creek! Let's work together to win G1<n>races!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely help you reach your full<n>potential!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my. Thank you for all of your<n>offers, everyone.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek, you've lived up to all of<n>my expectations.
Come with me, and<n>I'll prioritize your training.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Y-you! I knew it, you just had toshow up and snatch her away...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unparalleled among his peers, one of<n>the top veteran
trainers in all of Tracen<n>Academy has come to scout Super<n>
Creek.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, it's an honor to have a<n>famous trainer such as
yourself show<n>interest in me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That's right... A talented racer like<n>Super Creek deserves
nothing less<n>than a top-class trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After thinking about what's best for<n>her, I begin to take my
leave.<n>However, just as I turn around...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer! Please wait!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes! ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I received many good offers today,<n>but I believe you're the
best fit for me.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what?! Are you out of your<n>mind?! This rookie has no
track record<n>at all!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: A rookie trainer is still a trainer. Isn't<n>that right? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she smiles at me, the same<n>feeling of ease envelopes
me again.<n>The tension in my body melts away.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Will you partner up with me?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, the honor is all mine. I look<n>forward to working with
you! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, I finally take my first step<n>toward my future as a
trainer.
